text: Makoma Modjadji IV (19051980) was the fourth Rain Queen of the Balobedu tribe of the Limpopo Province of South Africa, succeeding her mother, Khetoane Modjadji, in 1959 and reigning until her death. She married Andreas Maake, with whom she had several children. She was succeeded by her eldest daughter, Mokope Modjadji. ==External links== *Some information on Makoma Category:1905 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Rain Queens Category:Female heirs apparent Category:20th-century women rulers
title: Makoma Modjadji
